Posts.Content: denied_stereotactic wrote: I wonder how often this happens?  I was on the table ready to tough it out through a biopsy, and was told that the mammogram couldn't see the calcifications.  I will need surgical biopsy.  Of course, this felt like a cruel joke, and I'm back to square one.  Anyone have this happen to them?
